statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_description FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 AND interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 3 AND interaction_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT COUNT(user_id), interaction_type FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommended_content, recommendation_timestamp FROM Recommendations WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_content FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_id IN (2, 5, 7) ORDER BY recommendation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 3 AND interaction_timestamp > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_name, location FROM users;
SELECT user_id, join_date FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT user_name, recommendation_type FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT user_name, location FROM users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, location, join_date FROM users WHERE location = 'New York' AND join_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT recommendation_type, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date < '2022-04-01' ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;

SELECT users.user_name, interactions.interaction_type, recommendations.recommendation_type FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id WHERE users.location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT name, age FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, name, gender FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserConnections WHERE connection_type = 'friend';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 20;
SELECT name, age FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, connection_user_id, connection_type FROM UserConnections ORDER BY connection_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT suggestion_id, user_id, suggestion_type, suggestion_content FROM ContentSuggestions WHERE suggestion_type = 'Movie' AND suggestion_content LIKE '%Action%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM User
SELECT username, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT content_id, title FROM Content ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT user_id, connection_user_id, status FROM Connection WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT user_id, action, target_id FROM Interaction LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM User WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS max_user_id FROM User;
SELECT u.username, c.status FROM User u JOIN Connection c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT r.user_id, c.title, r.rating FROM Recommendation r JOIN Content c ON r.content_id = c.content_id;
